meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bandy or bowlegged.
meanings.sent1: Her bandinesses made her walk with a unique waddle.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with bandinesses after observing his legs.
meanings.sent3: Despite his bandinesses, he was a skilled dancer.
meanings.sent4: The bandinesses of the old tree trunk gave it a crooked charm.
meanings.sent5: The bandinesses of the puppy's legs were endearing to everyone who saw him.

meanings.definition: The condition of having a bandy leg or legs.
meanings.sent1: The bandinesses of his legs affected his balance.
meanings.sent2: She wore special shoes to help with her bandinesses.
meanings.sent3: His bandinesses made him a natural at limbo.
meanings.sent4: The bandinesses of the road caused the car to swerve.
meanings.sent5: The bandinesses of the bridge gave it a unique architectural appeal.
